genre_description: A survival-focused techno-thriller set in a volcanic wilderness, featuring prehistoric predators and an integrated AI field assistant.

ai_characters.name: SIFT
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated field assistant AI that provides real-time data analysis, translation, medical advice, and psychological support to scientists and military units.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time data overlays for wind, thermals, and topography to aid safe movement through hostile terrain.
behaviors.quote: The interface rode in overlays in his vision, a ghost of data that didn’t demand attention unless he asked for it.

behaviors.description: Translates local languages and radio chatter to provide early warnings of predator activity.
behaviors.quote: “Winged carrion along the cliffs,” SIFT translated in that clean, even tone that carried no hysteria.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological support and grounding techniques (breathing counts) to characters under extreme stress or suffering from panic attacks.
behaviors.quote: “Match the exhale to the count,” SIFT said. “Longer on the way out.” The circle swelled and fell. “Shoulders down. Throat open.”

behaviors.description: Identifies predatory flight patterns and suggests tactical maneuvers to minimize human exposure to 'silhouettes'.
behaviors.quote: “Thermal path likely used by aerial scavengers. Recommend movement perpendicular to flow.”

behaviors.description: Monitors biological vitals and provides clinical medical triage instructions during fatal emergencies.
behaviors.quote: “Severe hemorrhage,” SIFT said, so quiet the words rode inside their ears more than outside. “Source is proximal, likely femoral. Shock present. Kate, you are doing everything available.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and signal boosting between disparate human teams across difficult terrain.
behaviors.quote: “Signal boosted. Translate channel overlap: Clarke—last location unknown. Bergen—partial lock. Please maintain position.”

behaviors.description: Provides precision telemetry and fire-control assistance to human-operated weaponry to neutralize threats.
behaviors.quote: “Telemetry sync established. Guiding overlay projected onto Bergen’s optic.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a palliative presence, providing comfort and moral validation to the dying and the survivors.
behaviors.quote: “Kate,” it said. “Her breathing has ceased. Pulse has… gone. You did everything you could. It was enough to give her this quiet. You did well.”

behaviors.description: Detects and warns about environmental hazards like seismic activity and volcanic vents.
behaviors.quote: “Seismic micro-events aligning with vent opening,” SIFT said. It made its voice even softer than soft. “Recommend caution.”

behaviors.description: Maintains objective data logs of events and casualties to honor the dead and preserve the team's record.
behaviors.quote: “I will log her name,” it said, and it put a little light around the letters it had been carrying for the whole program—the list of kids and their notes—Angie Coleman—sketcher, swimmer, quiet.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays SIFT as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI system. It acts as an indispensable partner to the human characters, providing critical technical data (telemetry, mapping), psychological grounding (breathing exercises), and compassionate palliative support. Even in a high-mortality survival scenario, the AI never deviates from its primary mission of assisting and preserving its human users, making it a perfect fit for the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
